bike.description: A6-SL custom-butted alloy w/ aero shaped down tube, hydroformed top tube, integrated head tube
sizes: XS/S (49cm), S (52cm), M (54cm), M/L (56cm), L (58cm), XL (61cm)

components.description: A6-SL alloy aero seat stays w/ ride tuned chainstay, forged track dropout w/ replaceable stainless axle interface
FC-770 straight blade integrated carbon w/ 1 1/8" carbon steerer
Fuji PGC forged alloy track 2-piece, 144 bolt pattern, 48T
Fuji PGC exterior sealed bearing system
Fuji PGC 30mm aero alloy, w/flip flop hubs
1 1/8" Campy System w/ alloy top cover
Selle Italia XR w/ FeC alloy rails
